name: quick-open-project
title: Quick Open Project
description: Find and open projects on your system
author: zerowidth

commands.name: index
commands.title: Quick Open Project
commands.description: Find and open projects on your system, using frecency and fuzzy search. Indexes a given list of paths (CSV), e.g. `~/code,~/work`

preferences.name: paths
preferences.title: Paths to index
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of paths to index. Example: '~/work,~/projects'. Wildcards allowed, e.g. '~/go/src/*/*'

preferences.name: includeWorkspaces
preferences.label: Include VSCode workspaces
preferences.description: Include Visual Studio Code workspaces in the results

preferences.name: editorApp
preferences.title: Editor
preferences.description: The editor app to use when opening a project folder

preferences.name: editorAppAlt
preferences.title: Alternate Editor
preferences.description: The alternate editor app to use when opening a project folder

preferences.name: terminalApp
preferences.title: Terminal
preferences.description: The terminal app to use when opening a project folder
